description: This file defines a custom React hook named useFetch that abstracts asynchronous data fetching with support for cancellation and retries.

methods.name: useFetch(asyncFn, deps = [], { retries = 0, initial = null } = {})
methods.description: A React hook for fetching data asynchronously with support for retries and cancellation, managing loading and error states.

ctags.name: useFetch
ctags.pattern: /^export function useFetch(asyncFn, deps = [], { retries = 0, initial = null } = {}) {$/
